DOC.brief_summary: A phase 2a , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study subject stable angina evaluate effect AMG 334 compare placebo exercise time exercise treadmill test ( ETT )
DOC.criteria: History chronic stable angina least 3 month prior screen , least 1 angina episode per month Ischemic Heart disease document Myocardial Infarction , Coronary angiography Revascularization procedure Receiving stable dos cardiac medication Completes 2 ETTs screen meeting protocol requirement Participating another investigational study Current prior malignancy within 5 year randomization Known sensitivity component investigational product Not able complete protocol require study visit Having follow within 3 month prior screen : Unstable angina acute coronary syndrome , Transient Ischemic attack ( TIA ) stroke , Revasculatization procedure , Instability STsegment depression screen ETTs , assess core ECG Laboratory
